plugins.prepareCmd: dotnet pack -v normal -c Release --include-symbols --include-source -o nupkg -p:Version=${nextRelease.version} -p:PackageVersion=${nextRelease.version} -p:IncludeSymbols=true -p:SymbolPackageFormat=snupkg ${process.env.PROJECT_NAME}/${process.env.PROJECT_NAME}.*proj && dotnet pack -v normal -c Release --include-symbols --include-source -o nupkg -p:PackageVersion=${nextRelease.version} -p:Version=${nextRelease.version}  -p:IncludeSymbols=true -p:SymbolPackageFormat=snupkg ${process.env.PROJECT_NAME}.AspNetCore/${process.env.PROJECT_NAME}.AspNetCore.*proj
